text: Tarapara amara tadera pichane anugami karechilama amadera rasulaganake ebam anugami karechilama mara'iyama-tanaya isake, ara take amara diyechilama injila ebam tara anusaridera antare diyechilama karuna o daya [1]. Ara sann'yasabada [2]--- eta to tara nijera'i allahara santusti labhera jan'ya prabartana karechila. Amara taderake etara bidhana de'ini; athaca eta'o ora yathayathabhabe palana kareni [3]. Atahpara tadera madhye yara imana enechila, taderake amara diyechilama tadera puraskara. Ara tadera adhikansa'i chila phasika
